attributes.action: Scap postage costs to armed forces serving in Iraq and Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a mother of 5 children whose only daughter is serving in Afghanistan.Last year she was in Iraq and the year before Bosnia.She is 20 years old.
To send her a parcel out it costs me between£5-£7.The items I send her can,t be bought over there.These parcels are good for her morale it gives her something to look forward to.
All our armed forces do such a great job,they are so brave putting there lives at risk every day they are out there.
I feel this is the least we can do for them so please support my petition and hopefully someone will listen.
Both me and my husband work and pay tax and I think this is one of the better things our tax money can be spent on.

Thankyou
Mrs Sharon Emery

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
